name: Unicorn Dungeon
description: Unicorn Dungeon is an absurdist comedy point & click adventure game following the adventures of Sir Typhil of Creulor as he attempts to secure a unicorn to bring to the castle.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 or higher Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4GHz Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTS 450+ with 1024MB+ VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Direct X 11 sound device
